title: The WotWots
overview: The WotWots is an enchanting early childhood series that follows the adventures of two adorable siblings from outer space, SpottyWot and DottyWot. This delightful pair of enquiring minds have come to Earth to explore and to marvel at the extraordinary diversity of life on the blue planet. The show celebrates this joy of discovery, making learning fun and demonstrates the positive values that are the building blocks of a true and enduring friendship.
